trans-unit.source: With runtime binding, a consumer service can use a “binding name” of their choosing in their configuration and lifecycle hook templates as a kind of handle to refer to the configuration values they need from the producer service. This name isn’t inherently tied to any particular package or service group name. Instead, when the service is run, users associate a service group with that binding name, which gives Chef Habitat all the information it needs to wire the producer and consumer services together.
trans-unit.target: 通过运行时绑定，消费者服务可以在配置和生命周期挂钩模板中使用其选择的“绑定名称”作为一种句柄，以引用生产者服务所需的配置值。此名称与任何特定的程序包或服务组名称没有固有的联系。而是在运行服务时，用户将服务组与该绑定名称相关联，从而为Chef Habitat提供将生产者和消费者服务联系在一起所需的所有信息。

trans-unit.source: With the 0.83.0 release of the Chef Habitat Supervisor, it is possible to have greater control over logging output, including the ability to dynamically adjust the logging configuration of a running Supervisor. There are two main ways of configuring logging, each of which has their own strengths and weaknesses: using environment variables, and using a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 随着Chef Habitat Supervisor的0.83.0版本的发布,可以对日志输出进行更大的控制,包括动态调整运行中的Supervisor的日志配置。配置日志的方式主要有两种,这两种方式各有优缺点:使用环境变量,和使用配置文件。

trans-unit.source: With the :before notification, the action specified for the nginx resource will not run until action has been taken on the notified resource (php-fpm).
trans-unit.target: 使用 :before 通知，为 nginx 资源指定的操作将不会运行，直到对通知的资源（ php-fpm ）采取了操作为止。

trans-unit.source: With the :create action, a user’s home directory is created based on HOME_DIR. If the home directory is missing, it is created unless CREATE_HOME in /etc/login.defs is set to no. When created, a skeleton set of files and sub-directories is also created in the home directory.
trans-unit.target: 通过 :create 动作，基于 HOME_DIR 创建用户的主目录。如果主目录丢失，除非它被创建 CREATE_HOME 在 /etc/login.defs 中设置为 no 。创建后，还会在主目录中创建一组框架的文件和子目录。

trans-unit.source: With the :modify action, a user’s home directory is moved to HOME_DIR. If the home directory is missing, it is created unless CREATE_HOME in /etc/login.defs is set to no. The contents of the user’s home directory are moved to the new location.
trans-unit.target: 通过 :modify 动作，用户的主目录被移动到 HOME_DIR 。如果主目录丢失，除非它被创建 CREATE_HOME 在 /etc/login.defs 中设置为 no 。用户主目录的内容将移动到新位置。

trans-unit.source: With the include_controls command in a profile, all controls from the named profile will be executed every time the including profile is executed.
trans-unit.target: 使用配置文件中的 include_controls 命令，每次执行包含配置文件时，都会执行命名配置文件中的所有控件。

trans-unit.source: With the cluster down, take a filesystem level backup of all backend nodes.
trans-unit.target: 在集群瘫痪后,对所有后端节点进行文件系统级别的备份。

trans-unit.source: With the improved custom resource pattern available starting with chef-client 12.5, the need to use definitions is greatly minimized. In every case when considering to use a definition, first evaluate whether that defintion is better represented as a custom resource.
trans-unit.target: 从chef-client 12.5开始,改进了自定义资源模式,大大降低了使用定义的必要性。在考虑使用定义的时候,首先要评估该定义是否能更好地表现为自定义资源。

trans-unit.source: With the new application operations dashboard in Chef Automate, operations teams gain comprehensive and customizable visibility into the health of the services that make up the application. This makes it easier to understand what is degrading the health of an applications and to keep it running smoothly.
trans-unit.target: 通过Chef Automate中新的应用操作仪表板,运营团队可以获得对构成应用的服务健康状况的全面和可定制的可见性。这使得它更容易了解是什么降低了应用程序的健康状况,并保持其平稳运行。

trans-unit.source: With the release of scaffolding-chef-inspec version 0.16.0 (Linux) and version 0.18.0 (Windows), we added the Chef InSpec Waivers feature. This feature allows you to specify a control ID in your Chef Habitat config that you would like to skip, or waive.
trans-unit.target: 随着 scaffolding-chef-inspec 版本0.16.0（Linux）和版本0.18.0（Windows）的发布，我们添加了Chef InSpec豁免功能。使用此功能，您可以在Chef Habitat配置中指定要跳过或放弃的控件ID。

trans-unit.source: With these settings, the Identity Provider’s metadata will be refreshed every day (1d), and if this request fails, Chef Automate will wait one minute (1m) before trying again. On failure, a retry will be attempted five times total. If the retries don’t succeed, the next attempt to fetch the metadata will be at the next refresh interval.
trans-unit.target: 使用这些设置，身份提供者的元数据将每天（1d）刷新，如果该请求失败，Chef Automate将等待一分钟（1m），然后重试。如果失败，将尝试重试五次。如果重试未成功，则下一次尝试获取元数据的尝试将在下一个刷新间隔进行。

trans-unit.source: Within Chef Automate, the Desktop dashboard uses four panels to summarize information: Daily Check-inCheck-in History, Top 10 Errors, and Time since Last Check-in. Selecting rows within these displays will list relevant desktops and selecting a singular desktop reveals its detailed information.
trans-unit.target: 在Chef Automate中，桌面仪表板使用四个面板来汇总信息：每日值机值机历史记录，前10个错误和上次值机时间。在这些显示中选择行将列出相关的桌面，选择单个桌面将显示其详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Within a describe block, it declares an individual test directly against the resource (as opposed to testing against one of the resource’s properties, as its does). Though it is possible to use universal matchers with it, it is much more typical to use resource-specific matchers.
trans-unit.target: 在一个描述块， it 声明了一个单独的测试，直接对资源（而不是对资源的一个测试性能，因为它的那样）。尽管可以使用通用匹配器， it 使用特定于资源的匹配器更为典型。

trans-unit.source: Within a describe block, its declares an individual test against a property of the resource (as opposed to testing directly against the resource itself, as it does). You must use universal matchers with its; you cannot use resource-specific matchers.
trans-unit.target: 在describe块内， its 声明针对资源属性的单个测试（与之相反，它直接针对资源本身进行测试）。您必须使用通用的匹配与 its ; 您不能使用特定于资源的匹配器。

trans-unit.source: Within a leader-follower topology, it is possible to get into a partitioned state where nodes are unable to achieve quorum. To solve this, use a permanent peer to heal the netsplit. Pass the --permanent-peer option, or it’s short form -I, to make a Supervisor act as a permanent peer.
trans-unit.target: 在领导者跟随者拓扑中，可能会进入节点无法达到法定人数的分区状态。要解决此问题，请使用永久对等体来修复netsplit。传递 --permanent-peer 选项，或简称 -I ，以使Supervisor充当永久对等方。

trans-unit.source: Without specifying --remote-sup, the hab CLI will always try to connect to a Supervisor running on the current host. It must still use the correct shared secret, however. As a last resort, if no secret is found in either a configuration file or an environment variable, the hab CLI will attempt to read one from /hab/sup/default/CTL_SECRET. In this way, it will use the same secret that the local Supervisor is using, enabling the request to proceed.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定 --remote-sup ，则 hab CLI将始终尝试连接到当前主机上运行的Supervisor。但是，它仍必须使用正确的共享机密。作为最后的选择，如果在配置文件或环境变量中均未找到秘密，则 hab CLI将尝试从 /hab/sup/default/CTL_SECRET 中读取一个秘密。这样，它将使用本地主管正在使用的相同机密，从而使请求继续进行。

This will make further progress through an initial reconfiguration impossible.

trans-unit.source: Workflow accelerates the adoption of continuous delivery and encourages DevOps collaboration. It provides a proven, reproducible workflow for managing changes as they flow through the pipeline from a local workstation, through automated tests, and out into production.
trans-unit.target: 工作流加速了持续交付的采用,并鼓励DevOps协作。它提供了一个经过验证的、可重复的工作流,用于管理从本地工作站、自动测试到生产的流水线上的变更。

trans-unit.source: Workflow allows you to define the infrastructure that participates in each stage. How you map infrastructure environments to pipeline phases is controlled by the build cookbook. In other words, whether a given phase job distributes work to other infrastructure is up to you. There are many ways to map infrastructure environments to pipeline phases, but here are some possible approaches.
trans-unit.target: 工作流允许您定义参与每个阶段的基础设施。如何将基础设施环境映射到管道阶段由构建食谱控制。换句话说,一个给定的阶段作业是否将工作分配给其他基础设施由你决定。有许多方法可以将基础设施环境映射到管道阶段,但以下是一些可能的方法。

trans-unit.source: Workflow ensures that only one change is active in each of the Union, Rehearsal, and Delivered stages at any one time. This orchestration increases safety by encouraging small batch change. In complex systems, identifying root causes of issues in the context of a single change is much easier than trying to analyze larger batches of changes across many different projects. In the future, Workflow’s dependency management features will be enhanced to include all concurrent deploys in Union, Rehearsal, and Delivered, as long as they map to completely unrelated dependency sets.
trans-unit.target: 工作流可确保在任何时候，联合，排练和交付阶段的每个阶段仅激活一项更改。这种编排通过鼓励小批量更改来提高安全性。在复杂的系统中，与尝试分析许多不同项目中的大批变更相比，在单个变更的背景下识别问题的根本原因要容易得多。将来，只要工作流映射到完全不相关的依赖项集，就将增强工作流的依赖项管理功能，以包括并发，排练和交付中的所有并发部署。

trans-unit.source: Workflow handles many types of software systems. Use it to:
trans-unit.target: 工作流处理多种类型的软件系统。用它来:

trans-unit.source: Workflow is a legacy feature for Chef Automate, which was designed for managing changes to both infrastructure and application code, giving your operations and development teams a common platform for developing, testing, and deploying cookbooks, applications, and more.
trans-unit.target: 工作流是Chef Automate的遗留功能,旨在管理基础设施和应用程序代码的变化,为您的运营和开发团队提供一个开发、测试和部署食谱、应用等的通用平台。

trans-unit.source: Workflow is a legacy feature for Chef Automate, which was designed for managing changes to both infrastructure and application code.
trans-unit.target: 工作流是Chef Automate的一个传统功能,它是为了管理基础设施和应用程序代码的变化而设计的。

trans-unit.source: Workflow is available in Chef Automate for existing users. If you are not already using Workflow, but are interested in the solution it offers, please contact your sales or success representative for support with continuous integration pipelines.
trans-unit.target: 现有用户可在Chef Automate中使用工作流。如果您尚未使用 Workflow,但对其提供的解决方案感兴趣,请联系您的销售或成功代表,以获得持续集成管道的支持。

trans-unit.source: Workflow is only available in Chef Automate for existing users. If you are not already using Workflow, but are interested in the solution it offers, please contact your sales or success representative for support with continuous integration pipelines.
trans-unit.target: 工作流仅在Chef Automate中为现有用户提供。如果您尚未使用 Workflow,但对其提供的解决方案感兴趣,请联系您的销售或成功代表,以获得持续集成管道的支持。

trans-unit.source: Workflow manages changes to both infrastructure and application code, giving your operations and development teams a common platform for developing, testing, and deploying cookbooks, applications, and more.

trans-unit.source: Workflow relies on git and uses its lightweight feature branches as the mechanism for handling changes before they merge, as well as its ability to perform merges automatically. Each pipeline has a designated target branch into which it will merge approved changes. Workflow uses a “gated master” model that manages merges to the target branch. (In preparation for using Workflow, it is helpful if team members understand how to use feature branches.)
trans-unit.target: Workflow依赖git，并使用其轻量级功能分支作为合并之前处理更改的机制以及自动执行合并的功能。每个管道都有一个指定的目标分支，它将合并已批准的更改。工作流使用“门控主”模型来管理到目标分支的合并。（在准备使用工作流时，如果团队成员了解如何使用功能分支将很有帮助。）

trans-unit.source: Workflow runners for Chef Automate 2 require the latest version of ChefDK, which includes Chef Infra Client 14.10. The runners will not function unless upgraded.
trans-unit.target: Chef Automate 2的工作流运行程序需要ChefDK的最新版本，其中包括Chef Infra Client 14.10。除非升级，否则跑步者将无法运行。

trans-unit.source: Workflow uses projects to organize work across multiple teams. You can create as many projects as you need. A common approach is to have one project for each major component of your system. Each project has its own git repository. (Workflow includes a git server for hosting project repositories. It is also possible to integrate with GitHub and GitHub Enterprise for the git-related aspects of the workflow.)
trans-unit.target: 工作流使用项目来组织多个团队的工作。你可以根据需要创建任意多的项目。一个常见的方法是为系统的每个主要组件设立一个项目。每个项目都有自己的git仓库。(Workflow包含一个用于托管项目仓库的git服务器。也可以与GitHub和GitHub Enterprise集成,用于工作流的git相关方面)。)

If this value is absolute, it may be outside the build’s working directory, in which case the contents of the path may not be persisted across build step executions, unless a volume for that path is specified. If the build specifies a RepoSource with dir and a step with a dir, which specifies an absolute path, the RepoSourcedir is ignored for the step’s execution.

trans-unit.source: X.509 certificates use public/private key pairs to sign and encrypt documents or communications over a network. They may also be used for authentication.

trans-unit.source: You can cancel queued or running phase jobs in the new job dispatch system. Simply click the trash can in the UI next to a phase run from the change view for the job you wish to cancel.

trans-unit.source: You can configure Chef Automate log level for all services by creating a TOML file and configuring the log level. By default each service will initialize at the “info” level but can be any of ‘debug, ‘info’, ‘warning’, ‘panic’, or ‘fatal’.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过创建TOML文件并配置日志级别来为所有服务配置Chef Automate日志级别。默认情况下，每个服务都将在“信息”级别初始化，但可以是“调试”，“信息”，“警告”，“恐慌”或“致命”中的任何一个。

Select the application and the “Log Viewer” and choose either the “Error” or “Output” to see stderr and stdout respectively. If you have SSH access into the nodes, the Mesos container directories are beneath /var/lib/mesos/slave/slaves.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过在DC / OS的“服务”选项卡上单击“马拉松”服务来获取正在运行的应用程序的输出。选择应用程序和“日志查看器”，然后选择“错误”或“输出”以分别查看 stderr 和 stdout 。如果您可以通过SSH访问节点，则Mesos容器目录位于 /var/lib/mesos/slave/slaves 下。

trans-unit.source: You can pin to a specific ChefDK version through the --chefdk-version option on the install-runner command or by using a version of ChefDK that you have installed locally on your Chef Automate server using the -I option. As an example, this is useful if you have not upgraded your cookbooks to be Chef Client 13 compliant and the latest version of ChefDK installs Chef Client 13 on your runner.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过 install-runner 命令上的 --chefdk-version 选项或使用 -I 选项使用在Chef自动服务器上本地安装的ChefDK版本，将其固定到特定的ChefDK版本。例如，如果您尚未将食谱升级为兼容Chef Client 13，并且最新版本的ChefDK在运行程序上安装了Chef Client 13，这将很有用。

trans-unit.source: You can provide a public origin key to Chef Habitat by pointing it to a Builder site that has the origin key with the --url argument to hab pkg install or using the hab origin key import command. Use hab origin key upload to upload origin keys to Builder. Use hab origin key download to download your origin keys from Builder to your environment. Use hab origin key import to read the key from a standard input stream or local file:
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过以下方式为Chef Habitat提供一个公共原始密钥：将其指向一个带有原始密钥的Builder站点，该站点的原始密钥带有 --url 参数指向 hab pkg install 或使用 hab origin key import 命令。使用 hab origin key upload 将原始密钥上载到Builder。使用 hab origin key download 将原始密钥从Builder下载到您的环境。使用 hab origin key import 从标准输入流或本地文件中读取密钥：

trans-unit.source: You can query all services currently loaded or running under the local Supervisor using the hab svc status command. This command will list all services loaded by the Supervisor along with their current state. The status command includes the version and release of the service and for services that are running, it will include the PID of the running service.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 hab svc status 命令查询当前在本地Supervisor下加载或运行的所有服务。该命令将列出由Supervisor加载的所有服务及其当前状态。该 status 的命令包括版本和服务，并为正在运行的服务的发布，将包括 PID 正在运行的服务。

trans-unit.source: You can run it like this

You can see if your Chef Automate server is in FIPS mode by running delivery status. It will say FIPS mode: enabled if it is enabled as well as output some instructions on how to set up your cli.toml to enable FIPS mode locally. If delivery status reports either FIPS mode: disabled or FIPS is missing completely from the report, please see FIPS kernel settings on how to enable FIPS mode in your Chef Automate server before proceeding.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过运行 delivery status 来查看Chef Automate服务器是否处于FIPS模式。它将显示 FIPS mode: enabled 如果已启用，则启用，并输出一些有关如何设置 cli.toml 以在本地启用FIPS模式的说明。如果 delivery status 报告报告中 FIPS mode: disabled 或FIPS完全丢失，请在继续之前查看FIPS内核设置，以了解如何在Chef Automate服务器中启用FIPS模式。

trans-unit.source: You can see the full status by running cat /proc/drbd:
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过运行cat /proc/drbd 查看完整状态：

trans-unit.source: You can see the job queue, running jobs, what your runners are currently doing, runner health, and so on. Navigate to Workflow -> Runners in the UI to see all the possibilities.
trans-unit.target: 您可以看到作业队列，正在运行的作业，跑步者当前正在做什么，跑步者健康状况等等。在用户界面中导航至“工作流程->运行器”以查看所有可能性。

trans-unit.source: You can set inputs in other profiles that you depend on using profile inheritance.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用配置文件继承在您所依赖的其他配置文件中设置输入。

trans-unit.source: You can set the dry_run variable in your habitat config, and the remediation will run a dry run for all of its controls and output a report on what actions it would have taken.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在 habitat 配置中设置 dry_run 变量，并且补救措施将对其所有控件进行试运行，并输出有关其将采取的措施的报告。

trans-unit.source: You can set up a matrix of sub-jobs to run a phase on multiple platform configurations. This is itself a phase filter, overriding the default filter but running the phase job repeatedly on multiple runners. Matrix filters are only for phase filters and not the default filter.
trans-unit.target: 您可以设置一个子作业矩阵,在多个平台配置上运行一个阶段。这本身就是一个阶段过滤器,覆盖了默认过滤器,但在多个运行器上重复运行阶段作业。矩阵过滤器只适用于阶段过滤器,而不是默认过滤器。

trans-unit.source: You can set up the infrastructure environments either manually or by using automated, on-the-fly provisioning upon first use. The manual approach is simple, but it has the disadvantage of not having an initial run-list for the nodes in the environment. Automated provisioning requires adding code to the build cookbook, but it is more replicable than the manual approach. Automated provisioning also bootstraps the initial run-list for each node in the environment. The delivery-truck cookbook makes it easy to customize your pipeline’s build cookbook for the environments you want to use for each stage of the pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 您可以手动设置基础架构环境，也可以在首次使用时使用自动即时配置来设置基础架构环境。手动方法很简单，但是它的缺点是环境中的节点没有初始运行列表。自动化配置需要向构建指南中添加代码，但是它比手动方法更具可复制性。自动化配置还可以为环境中的每个节点启动初始运行列表。在 delivery-truck 菜谱可以方便地自定义管道的构建食谱您要使用的管道的每个阶段的环境。

trans-unit.source: You can set up the infrastructure environments either manually or by using automated, on-the-fly provisioning upon first use. The manual approach is simple, but it has the disadvantage of not having an initial run-list for the nodes in the environment. Automated provisioning requires adding code to the build cookbook, but it is more replicable than the manual approach. Automated provisioning also bootstraps the initial run-list for each node in the environment. The delivery-truck cookbook makes it easy to customize your pipeline’s build cookbook for the environments you want to use for each stage of the pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 您可以手动设置基础架构环境，也可以在首次使用时使用自动即时配置来设置基础架构环境。手动方法很简单，但是它的缺点是环境中的节点没有初始运行列表。自动化配置需要向构建指南中添加代码，但是它比手动方法更具可复制性。自动化配置还可以为环境中的每个节点启动初始运行列表。在交付卡车菜谱可以方便地自定义管道的构建食谱您要使用的管道的每个阶段的环境。

trans-unit.source: You can specify different cookbook sources in Policyfile.rb, including a private supermarket. See the Policyfile documentation for examples.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在 Policyfile.rb 中指定其他食谱书源，包括一个私人超市。有关示例，请参见Policyfile文档。

trans-unit.source: You can specify one or more reporters using the --reporter cli flag. You can also specify a output by appending a path separated by a colon.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 --reporter cli标志指定一个或多个报告器。您还可以通过添加用冒号分隔的路径来指定输出。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the maximum number of inflight data collector requests. The default value is sixty times the number of the machine’s available CPUs.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定运行中数据收集器请求的最大数量。默认值为计算机可用CPU数量的六十倍。

trans-unit.source: You can supply a user.toml containing any configuration data that you want to override default values. This file should be placed in the Chef Habitat user directory under the config subdirectory of the specific service directory that owns the configuration data. For example, to override the default configuration of the myservice service, this user.toml would be located at /hab/user/myservice/config/user.toml.
trans-unit.target: 您可以提供一个 user.toml ,其中包含要覆盖默认值的所有配置数据。该文件应放在拥有配置数据的特定服务目录的 config 子目录下的Chef Habitat user 目录中。例如，要覆盖 myservice 服务的默认配置，此 user.toml 将位于 /hab/user/myservice/config/user.toml 。

trans-unit.source: You can then select Reset Validation Key next to the organization for which the key is to be reset.
trans-unit.target: 然后，您可以在要重置其密钥的组织旁边选择“重置验证密钥”。

trans-unit.source: You can upload keys for the origin through the web interface for Builder, or by using the hab origin key upload command. You must have the access token for authentication, as described earlier, before you can upload keys.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过Builder的Web界面或使用 hab origin key upload 命令上载原点的密钥。如上所述，您必须具有访问令牌进行身份验证，然后才能上载密钥。

trans-unit.source: You can upload origin keys that you generate on the command line to Chef Habitat Builder by selecting either the Upload a private key or Upload a public key icon, and copy your key into the form that appears.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过选择上载私钥或上载公钥图标，将在命令行上生成的原始密钥上载到Chef Habitat Builder ，然后将您的密钥复制到显示的表单中。

trans-unit.target: 您可以在Windows PowerShell中使用 chef shell-init 。

trans-unit.target: 您可以通过以下格式指定URI来使用位于远程位置的 project.toml 文件：

trans-unit.source: You can use a credential set, and then override individual options using command line options.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用一个凭证集,然后使用命令行选项覆盖单个选项。

trans-unit.source: You can use all the default plan variables shipped with Chef Habitat. Read more about plan variables in the Chef Habitat documentation.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用Chef Habitat随附的所有默认计划变量。在Chef Habitat文档中阅读有关计划变量的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: You can use an optional passphrase with key_rsa
trans-unit.target: 您可以在 key_rsa 中使用可选的密码短语

trans-unit.source: You can use any of the runtime configuration settings, either defined by you in your config file, or defined by Chef Habitat.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用任何运行时配置设置，这些设置可以由您在配置文件中定义，也可以由Chef Habitat定义。

trans-unit.source: You can use associate your ssh or WinRM credentials with your EC2 instances using tag keys or values, using the option at the bottom of the screen. This feature supports wildcard matching, which is useful for grouping nodes. Chef Automate detects your nodes immediately after any update to the Node Manager, and maintains a current list of your node status. The following example uses tag with the key ‘Name’ and the value ‘vj-’ to associate those nodes with the ‘ssh ec22’ credential.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用标签键或值，使用屏幕底部的选项，将 ssh 或 WinRM 凭据与EC2实例相关联。此功能支持通配符匹配，这对分组节点很有用。在对节点管理器进行任何更新之后，Chef Automate都会立即检测到您的节点，并维护您节点状态的当前列表。以下示例使用带有键“名称”和值“ vj-”的标签将这些节点与“ ssh ec22”凭据关联。

trans-unit.source: You can use basic Linux commands like ls in this environment. You can also use the help command the Chef Habitat build system provides in this context to see what other functions can help you debug the plan.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在这种环境中使用基本的Linux命令，例如 ls 。您还可以使用Chef Habitat构建系统在此上下文中提供的 help 命令来查看还有哪些其他功能可以帮助您调试计划。

trans-unit.source: You can use block expressions to add basic logic to your template such as checking if a value exists or iterating through a list of items.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用块表达式为您的模板添加基本逻辑,如检查一个值是否存在或在项目列表中迭代。

trans-unit.source: You can use role based access control (RBAC) from the command line. An origin MEMBER_ACCOUNT is the name used to sign in to Chef Habitat builder. You can find the list of user names on an origin’s Members Tab. (Builder > Origin > Members)
trans-unit.target: 您可以从命令行使用基于角色的访问控制（RBAC）。来源 MEMBER_ACCOUNT 是用于登录Chef Habitat构建器的名称。您可以在来源的“成员”选项卡上找到用户名列表。（生成器>来源>成员）

trans-unit.source: You can use the --bootstrap-template option with the knife bootstrap subcommand to specify the name of your bootstrap template file:
trans-unit.target: 可以将 --bootstrap-template 选项与 knife bootstrap 子命令一起使用，以指定引导程序模板文件的名称：

trans-unit.source: You can use the chef shell-init command with Windows PowerShell to add the appropriate variables to your environment.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在Windows PowerShell中使用 chef shell-init 命令将适当的变量添加到您的环境中。

trans-unit.source: You can use these default Chef-created roles in your policies, or create more custom roles for further customized permissions. You can later edit any roles you create.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在策略中使用这些默认的 Chef 创建的角色,或者创建更多的自定义角色以获得进一步的自定义权限。您可以稍后编辑您创建的任何角色。

trans-unit.source: You can use this hook in place of $pkg_svc_run when you need more complex behavior such as setting environment variables or command options that are based on dynamic configuration.
trans-unit.target: 当您需要更复杂的行为（例如设置基于动态配置的环境变量或命令选项）时，可以使用此钩子代替 $pkg_svc_run 。

trans-unit.source: You can use your personal access token as a Windows environment variable for a single session by passing it in the command line or save it in your user settings for use across sessions.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过在命令行中传递个人访问令牌作为单个会话的Windows环境变量，也可以将其保存在用户设置中以供跨会话使用。

trans-unit.source: You can verify that Chef Automate can read and parse your key by accessing https://<yourChef AutomateDomain>/api/v0/oidc/jwks:
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过访问 https://<yourChef AutomateDomain>/api/v0/oidc/jwks 来验证Chef Automate是否可以读取和解析密钥：

trans-unit.source: You can view the analytics we collect before it is sent. Find—and remove—your data in the HOME/.chef-workstation/telemetry/ folder. We save the data from a current chef-run in the telemetry folder and collect it at the start of the next chef-run.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在发送之前查看我们收集的分析。在 HOME/.chef-workstation/telemetry/ 文件夹中查找并删除您的数据。我们将当前 chef-run 中的数据保存在遥测文件夹中，并在下一次 chef-run 开始时进行收集。

trans-unit.source: You can view the list of origin secrets and delete them in Chef Habitat Builder. However, the primary way of interacting with origin secrets is with the Chef Habitat CLI.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在Chef Habitat Builder中查看起源秘密列表并删除它们。然而,与原点秘密互动的主要方式是使用Chef Habitat CLI。

trans-unit.source: You can write plans to package up these binary artifacts with minimal special handling. This article covers some tips and tricks for getting this software into Chef Habitat.
trans-unit.target: 您可以编写计划,以最小的特殊处理方式打包这些二进制工件。这篇文章涵盖了将这个软件放入Chef Habitat的一些提示和技巧。

trans-unit.source: You can write to the /var/, /static/, and /data/ directories. Access these with your runtime configuration setting variable.
trans-unit.target: 您可以写入 /var/ ， /static/ 和 /data/ 目录。使用 runtime configuration setting 变量访问它们。

trans-unit.source: You cannot apply a license after your initial deployment by patching the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 在初始部署后,您不能通过修补配置文件来应用许可证。

trans-unit.source: You cannot block the thread in a hook unless it is in the run hook. Never call hab or sleep in a hook that is not the run hook.
trans-unit.target: 除非线程在 run 挂钩中，否则您无法将其阻塞在挂钩中。不要调用 hab 或 sleep 在一个钩子，不是 run 钩。

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the admin username, name, and password set during initial deployment.
trans-unit.target: 您不能更改初始部署时设置的管理员用户名、名称和密码。

trans-unit.source: You cannot concatenate an object (e.g. {{strConcat web}}), but you could concatenate the variables in an object (e.g. {{strConcat web.list}}).
trans-unit.target: 您无法串联对象（例如 {{strConcat web}} ），但是可以串联对象中的变量（例如 {{strConcat web.list}} ）。

trans-unit.source: You cannot have both LDAP and SAML authentication enabled at the same time. If you do, the reconfigure will fail with an appropriate error message.
trans-unit.target: 您不能同时启用LDAP和SAML认证。如果您这样做,重新配置将以适当的错误消息失败。

trans-unit.source: You cannot join an object (e.g. {{strJoin web}}), but you could join the variables in an object (e.g. {{strJoin web.list "/"}}).
trans-unit.target: 您不能加入对象（例如 {{strJoin web}} ），但是可以将变量加入对象（例如 {{strJoin web.list "/"}} ）。

trans-unit.source: You cannot log in to the Chef Automate web UI on the standby server.
trans-unit.target: 您无法登录到备用服务器上的 Chef Automate Web UI。

trans-unit.source: You cannot subclass, and must use mixins for code-sharing (which is really a best practice anyway – e.g. see languages like rust which do not support subclassing).
trans-unit.target: 您不能子类化，并且必须使用mixins进行代码共享（无论如何，这实际上是一种最佳实践-例如，查看诸如rust之类的不支持子类化的语言）。

trans-unit.source: You do not have to choose a complete recipe run-list now if you are not sure which recipes you want to bootstrap a node with. When running Chef Infra Client 15.x, at a minimum we recommend adding the cron resource in the chef-client cookbook to your run-list. This will help you control how and when the chef-client command will run and maintain your current configuration. Use the -r or --run-list option with the knife bootstrap subcommand to set a run-list on a node, for example -r recipe[myrecipe::cron].
trans-unit.target: 如果不确定要与哪个引导节点一起使用的配方，则不必立即选择完整的配方运行列表。在运行Chef Infra Client 15.x时，至少建议将Chef-Client Cookbook中的cron资源添加到您的运行列表中。这将帮助您控制 chef-client 命令的运行方式和时间以及维护当前配置的时间。将 -r 或 --run-list 选项与 knife bootstrap 子命令一起使用，以在节点上设置运行列表，例如 -r recipe[myrecipe::cron] 。

trans-unit.source: You may see a lot of converge_by and updated_by_last_action in the core chef resources. This is sometimes due to the fact that Chef is written as a declarative language with an imperative language, which means someone has to take the first step and write the declarative file resources in imperative Ruby. As such, core Chef resources may not represent ideal code examples with regard to what custom resources should look like.
trans-unit.target: 您可能会在核心Chef资源中看到很多 converge_by 和 updated_by_last_action 。有时这是由于Chef是用命令式语言以声明性语言编写的，这意味着有人必须迈出第一步，用命令式Ruby编写声明性文件资源。因此，关于自定义资源的外观，核心Chef资源可能无法代表理想的代码示例。

trans-unit.source: You start with a local checkout of the project’s git repository. You create a feature branch, make a change in that branch and test it locally. When you’re ready, submit the change using the delivery review command (part of the Chef Automate command line tool). This command submits the change to Chef Automate and kicks off the pipeline. The command is the equivalent to git push, although it also creates a change in Chef Automate that is similar to a pull request in GitHub and other git-based version control systems.
trans-unit.target: 您首先从本地检查项目的git存储库开始。您创建一个功能分支，在该分支中进行更改并在本地进行测试。准备就绪后，请使用 delivery review 命令（Chef Automate命令行工具的一部分）提交更改。此命令将更改提交给Chef Automate并启动管道。该命令等效于 git push ，尽管它还会在Chef Automate中创建一个更改，类似于GitHub和其他基于git的版本控制系统中的拉取请求。

trans-unit.source: You start with a local checkout of the project’s git repository. You create a feature branch, make a change in that branch and test it locally. When you’re ready, submit the change using the delivery review command (part of the Workflow command line tool). This command submits the change to Workflow and kicks off the pipeline. The command is the equivalent to git push, although it also creates a change in Workflow that is similar to a pull request in GitHub and other git-based version control systems.
trans-unit.target: 您首先从本地检查项目的git存储库开始。您创建一个功能分支，在该分支中进行更改并在本地进行测试。准备就绪后，使用 delivery review 命令（工作流命令行工具的一部分）提交更改。此命令将更改提交到工作流并启动管道。该命令等效于 git push ，尽管它还会在Workflow中创建与GitHub和其他基于git的版本控制系统中的pull request类似的更改。

trans-unit.source: You will also be asked if you want to register Supervisor control gateway secret (see Remote Command-and-Control of Supervisors for further details).
trans-unit.target: 系统还会询问您是否要注册Supervisor控制网关机密（有关更多详细信息，请参见Supervisor的远程命令和控制）。

trans-unit.source: You will need a local repository on your workstation for storing your cookbooks and related chef work, and for sharing it with GitHub or another version control system.
trans-unit.target: 你需要在你的工作站上建立一个本地仓库,用于存储你的烹饪书和相关的厨师工作,并与GitHub或其他版本控制系统共享。

trans-unit.source: You will need an API token to send API requests.
trans-unit.target: 您将需要一个API令牌来发送API请求。

trans-unit.source: You will need different settings to tie users and groups together:
trans-unit.target: 你将需要不同的设置来将用户和组绑定在一起。

trans-unit.source: You will need the chef-automate command line tool to initiate your upgrade.
trans-unit.target: 您将需要 chef-automate 命令行工具来启动升级。

trans-unit.source: You will need to create two device groups for macOS devices and two for Windows (a total of four device groups). You will use the first device group to apply the initial enrollment profile. The second device group is for applying, updating, and removing packages, scripts, etc. on the devices.
trans-unit.target: 您需要为 macOS 设备创建两个设备组,为 Windows 创建两个设备组(共四个设备组)。您将使用第一个设备组来应用初始注册配置文件。第二个设备组用于应用、更新和删除设备上的包、脚本等。

trans-unit.source: You will only need to enable FIPS if you are a US non-military government agency, or contracting with one, and you are contractually obligated to meet federal government security standards. If you are not a US non-military governmental agency, or you are not contracting with one, and you are not contractually obligated to meet federal government security standards, then do not enable FIPS. Chef products have robust security standards even without FIPS, and FIPS prevents the use of certain hashing algorithms you might want to use, so we only recommend enabling FIPS if it is contractually necessary.
trans-unit.target: 只有当你是一个美国非军事政府机构,或与一个政府机构签订合同,并且你有合同义务满足联邦政府的安全标准时,你才需要启用FIPS。如果您不是美國非軍事政府機構,或您沒有與政府機構簽約,而且您也沒有合約義務滿足聯邦政府的安全標準,那麼就不要啟用 FIPS。即使不启用FIPS,Chef产品也有强大的安全标准,而且FIPS会阻止您使用某些您可能想要使用的散列算法,所以我们只建议在合同上有必要时启用FIPS。

trans-unit.source: You will receive a confirmation email. Use the link in the email to confirm your confirm your email address.
trans-unit.target: 您将收到一封确认邮件。请使用邮件中的链接确认您的电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: You’ll need to add Automate’s TLS certificate to Builder’s list of accepted certificates in addition to these configuration changes. Locate Automate’s default self-signed certificate by running cat /hab/svc/automate-load-balancer/data/automate.example.com.cert You can copy this default certificate, and then add it to your Builder instance’s list of accepted certs.
trans-unit.target: 除了这些配置更改之外，您还需要将Automate的TLS证书添加到Builder的接受证书列表中。通过运行 cat /hab/svc/automate-load-balancer/data/automate.example.com.cert 找到Automate的默认自签名证书。您可以复制此默认证书，然后将其添加到Builder实例的接受证书列表中。

trans-unit.source: You’ll use the chef and knife commands to upload data to the Chef Infra Server from the chef-repo directory. Once uploaded, Chef Infra Client uses that data to manage the nodes registered with the Chef Infra Server and to ensure that it applies the right cookbooks, policyfiles, and settings to the right nodes in the right order.
trans-unit.target: 您将使用 chef and knife 命令将数据从chef-repo目录上载到Chef Infra Server。上传后，Chef Infra Client使用该数据来管理在Chef Infra Server中注册的节点，并确保将正确的食谱，策略文件和设置以正确的顺序应用于正确的节点。

trans-unit.source: Your cookbooks directory must have all three of these cookbooks installed before you will be able to use the Supermarket cookbook wrapper. In addition the necessary cookbooks, a private Chef Supermarket has the following requirements:
trans-unit.target: 您的 cookbooks 目录必须已安装所有这三本菜谱，然后才能使用超市菜谱包装器。除了必要的食谱外，私人厨师超级市场还具有以下要求：

trans-unit.source: Your AWS credentials (access key ID and secret access key)
trans-unit.target: 您的AWS凭证(访问密钥ID和秘密访问密钥)。

trans-unit.source: Your Automate instance must be reachable (open to incoming traffic) from the instances being scanned in order for the SSM scanning to work. You can filter the instances to be scanned by specifying tag key/value matches or regions.
trans-unit.target: 您的 Automate 实例必须可以从正在扫描的实例中到达(对传入流量开放),以便 SSM 扫描工作。您可以通过指定标签键/值匹配或区域来过滤要扫描的实例。
您的 Azure PEM 文件名。
您的 Azure 发布设置文件

trans-unit.source: Your Azure credentials (client ID, client secret, and tenant ID)
trans-unit.target: 您的 Azure 凭证(客户 ID、客户机密和租户 ID)。
您的 Azure 主机名称

trans-unit.source: Your continuous integration server can promote a Chef Habitat package (a .hart file) to a channel by calling the Chef Habitat CLI. This promotion method allows you to deploy a new version of your application in a pull-based manner by using the Chef Habitat Supervisor. Because this promotion process can be invoked non-interactively through the Chef Habitat CLI, you can manage your deployments using your existing tooling. If you choose, you can also do this promotion process manually. More complex application environments can also invoke the promotion process using a scheduling tool or provisioning tool to help manage infrastructure resources in addition to promoting Chef Habitat packages.
trans-unit.target: 您的持续集成服务器可以通过调用Chef Habitat CLI来将Chef Habitat软件包（.hart文件）升级到频道。通过这种升级方法，您可以使用Chef Habitat Supervisor以基于拉的方式部署应用程序的新版本。由于可以通过Chef Habitat CLI非交互地调用此升级过程，因此您可以使用现有工具来管理部署。如果选择，您也可以手动执行此升级过程。更复杂的应用程序环境还可以使用计划工具或预配工具来调用升级过程，以帮助管理基础架构资源，而不是推广Chef Habitat软件包。

trans-unit.source: Your runner should be reachable via SSH from your Chef Automate instance. For this to succeed, you need to make sure its subnet, security groups, and SSH key pair are configured correctly. We also recommend setting up a dedicated SSH key pair in AWS and copying the private key to your Chef Automate instance and use it while running install-runner command.
trans-unit.target: 应该可以从Chef Automate实例通过SSH与您的跑步者联系。为了使此操作成功，您需要确保正确配置了其子网，安全组和SSH密钥对。我们还建议您在AWS中设置专用的SSH密钥对，并将私钥复制到Chef Automate实例，并在运行install-runner命令时使用它。

trans-unit.source: Yum automatically synchronizes remote metadata to a local cache. Chef Infra Client creates a copy of the local cache, and then stores it in-memory during a Chef Infra Client run. The in-memory cache allows packages to be installed during a Chef Infra Client run without the need to continue synchronizing the remote metadata to the local cache while the Chef Infra Client run is in-progress.
trans-unit.target: Yum自动将远程元数据同步到本地缓存。Chef Infra Client会创建本地缓存的副本,然后在Chef Infra Client运行期间将其存储在内存中。内存中的缓存允许在Chef Infra Client运行期间安装包,而不需要在Chef Infra Client运行过程中继续将远程元数据同步到本地缓存。

trans-unit.source: Yum automatically synchronizes remote metadata to a local cache. The chef-client creates a copy of the local cache, and then stores it in-memory during the chef-client run. The in-memory cache allows packages to be installed during the chef-client run without the need to continue synchronizing the remote metadata to the local cache while the chef-client run is in-progress.
trans-unit.target: Yum自动将远程元数据同步到本地缓存。chef-client会创建本地缓存的副本,然后在chef-client运行时将其存储在内存中。内存中的缓存允许在 chef-client 运行期间安装软件包,而不需要在 chef-client 运行过程中继续将远程元数据同步到本地缓存。

trans-unit.source: Zone where this node group is located

a group_query_filter of (|(cn=group1)(cn=group2)) would restrict the group search results to either one of those groups. Note that this has no implications on which users get authenticated; it only affects the groups recognized by Chef Automate. For example, given users Jane and Jack, where Jane is a member of group1 and group3, and Jack of group3 and group4: Jane’s groups would resolve to group1 only, and Jack would have no groups – but still be able to access Chef Automate. In a similar manner, selected groups could be excluded from the results explicitly, by using a filter like (!cn=group2)
trans-unit.target: 一个 group_query_filter 的 (|(cn=group1)(cn=group2)) 将限制组搜索结果的那些基团中的任一个。请注意，这与对哪些用户进行身份验证无关。它只会影响Chef Automate认可的组。例如，给定用户Jane和Jack，其中Jane是 group1 和 group3 的成员，而Jack是 group3 和 group4 的成员：Jane的组将仅解析为 group1 ，而Jack将没有任何组-但仍然可以访问Chef Automate。以类似的方式，通过使用类似 (!cn=group2) 的过滤器，可以将选定的组明确地从结果中排除。

trans-unit.source: after-sb-0pri: A split-brain event has been detected and neither node is the primary node. The discard-younger-primary action will roll back any changes made on the last host that was the primary node.
trans-unit.target: after-sb-0pri：已检测到 split-brain 事件，并且两个节点都不是主节点。该 discard-younger-primary 行动将回滚最后一个主机，这是在主节点上所做的任何更改。

trans-unit.source: after-sb-1pri: A split-brain event has been detected and only one node believes that it was the primary node when the event happened. The discard-secondary action will continue operations on the primary node and will assume that the secondary node was lost.
trans-unit.target: after-sb-1pri：检测到 split-brain 事件，只有一个节点认为该事件发生时是主要节点。该 discard-secondary 行动将继续在主节点上操作，并假设辅助节点丢失。

trans-unit.source: after-sb-2pri: A split-brain event has been detected and both nodes believed they were primary nodes. The call-pri-lost-after-sb action will attempt to apply the discard-younger-primary from the 0pri configuration to determine which host should be the primary node. Once determined, the other host takes action to become the secondary node.
trans-unit.target: after-sb-2pri：已检测到 split-brain 事件，并且两个节点都认为它们是主要节点。该 call-pri-lost-after-sb 操作将尝试以应用 discard-younger-primary 从 0pri 配置，以确定哪些主机应该是主节点。一旦确定，其他主机将采取行动以成为辅助节点。
